verses:
1. Wanthengwa wakulindizga Fumu mukwiza kwinu 
Mwana wachiuta zani mufiske khumbo linu 
Kwiza kwinu ntchitumbiko palije kuluska ichi 
Zani lubiro Fumu fiskani nyengo yinu.

2. Muli nase nyengo yose tikumuchindikani 
M'mazgu ghinu Fumu mtipe chivwano na nkhongono 
Kuti timlindizganinge nakuwona chisko chinu 
Zanu lubiro Fumu fiskani nyengo yinu,

3. Tibe maso nyengo yose nyali zithu zibale 
Mutipeso na mafuta tiyime kulindizga 
Tinozgekerenge ntchemo wanthengwa sono wafika 
Zani lubiro Fumu fiskani nyengo yinu.

4. Manwekero ghithu ghose tikabepo pa nthengwa 
Fumu Yesu labiskani tikumulindizgani 
M'chimwemwe tikulabiska kwa imwe na ku m'chemani 
Zani lubiro Fumu fiskani nyengo yinu.

1. Mitima yithu yiwonge Fumu yatitumbika tiyiwonge 
Yiri na ise pavinthu vyose lusungu Iwake mwelulipo.

2. Muchindikike Chiuta withu tikuwonga uwemi winu 
Muthaski mtuba nkhongono zinu zikubusa kwa myira-yira.

1. M'nditore Fumu ndibe winu, nkhumulombani, 
Mundisuke Ku uheni nkhum'gomezgani. 
Ndimwe Chiuta wane na Mphanji. 
Khumbo linu libusenge. 
Khumbo linu libusenge.

1. Tikwimba nachimwemwe sumu yakubonga 
Tikwimba na kuonga vitumbiko vyake.

2. Mwimbire Khristu mthaski m'ndopa watithaska 
Mwimbire Khristu Mthaski kwamuyirayira.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Marumbo kwa muthaski watipa kutemwa 
Kuti m'nkhongono zake tikwere kuchanya 
Kuti m'nkhongono zake tikwere Kuchanya

details.sourceTitle: Tis Thee who chose me Father

verses:
1. Dada mukandisola ndibe mwana winu 
Kuti nditebetenge apo kuli nyengo 
Mu'chizi mwandisora kuti ndibe winu 
M'nkhongono ya mzimu ndimanyenge khumbo linu.

2. Nanga ndibe muheni mu'chizi nkhutowa 
Mukutemwa kutuba mukundilongozga 
Pakurwa na uheni imwe muli nane m'chivwano 
Ndilondezge nkhafike kuchanya.
